reviewText: This is a bittersweet movie with tears and laughs and is just great.  I highly recommend it.  It's only VHS if you want English subtitles.  There is a Japanese DVD but I'm pretty sure it has no subtitles.  Too bad, this movie could use a wider audience.

This movie captured so much of the joys and hardships of a real family man trying to serve his company, wife and children, and parents, in modern Japan.  Having lived in Japan for a bit, it seemed quite on the mark.  The frustrating moments were often quite hysterically funny, sometimes quite painful.  A wonderful movie, even for  someone with no Japan background, capturing the struggles and joys of trying to be a man with heart.
